changes.action: Show logos of integrated Google services
changes.example: Gmail, Drive, Docs, Calendar, Meet logos

changes.action: Prioritize single-column layout with larger tap targets
changes.example: Min 44px touch targets, remove horizontal scrolling

changes.action: Implement hamburger menu with clear sections
changes.example: Sticky header with prominent CTA always visible

changes.action: Optimize images for mobile bandwidth
changes.example: Serve WebP format, max 300KB per image

changes.action: Simplify forms to essential fields only
changes.example: Single-field email capture, large submit button

changes.action: Shorten headline to max 8 words
changes.example: Before: "Gemini: The Future of AI-Powered Productivity..." → After: "Your AI Assistant, Powered by Google"

changes.action: Add benefit-focused subheadline
changes.example: Add: "Get accurate answers with real-time web access and Google integration"

changes.action: Add animated product screenshot or demo
changes.example: Include 3-5 second auto-playing demo loop

changes.action: Use action-oriented, benefit-focused text
changes.example: Before: "Try Now" → After: "Start Creating with Gemini"

changes.action: Add CTA above the fold AND after each benefit section
changes.example: Minimum 3 CTAs per page at strategic points

changes.action: Increase contrast and size for visibility
changes.example: Use Google Blue (#4285f4) with white text, min 48px height

changes.action: Add low-friction secondary action
changes.example: Add "Watch Demo" or "See Examples" as alternative

changes.action: Add hover animations and click-to-expand
changes.example: Transform static features into interactive cards with details modal

changes.action: Add interactive product demo or playground
changes.example: Embed live Gemini example users can try (pre-populated prompts)

changes.action: Add interactive feature comparison slider
changes.example: Gemini vs ChatGPT vs Claude - users toggle features

changes.action: Add 15-30 second feature highlight videos
changes.example: Auto-play muted demo loops with play/pause control

changes.example: Max 3 bullet points per section, 10 words per bullet

changes.example: Before: "Leverage multimodal capabilities" → After: "Work with text, images, and code"

changes.action: Lead with user benefits, not features
